title: Remote Education Readiness and Lifelong Learning Awareness Enhancement Program for Nursing Practicum Students

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Education to improve remote learning adaptability for nursing interns and establish a lifelong learning culture

learning_goals: Learners improve their proficiency in using remote education tools (smartphone-based) by at least 90%.
Learners achieve a score of 85 or higher (out of 100) on the remote education readiness assessment scale.
Over 90% of learners respond positively to surveys on the necessity of lifelong learning.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
